title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       2016 Guide to the Gap Trip Planner (16 MB PDF): Contains trip planning information and calendar of park events.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 28 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Ecozone Discovery Room!      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Pocono Environmental Education Center Fees: $2 per person     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Climb into a bald eagle’s nest, crawl into a bat cave, and dig in a fossil pit!  View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Frog Frenzy       Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Pocono Environmental Education Center Fees: $5 per person     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join us for a fun morning at the ponds and streams!  View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Open House Tours of Foster Armstrong and Neldon-Roberts Stonehouse      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Foster Armstrong and Neldon-Roberts Stonehouse Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Open House Tours at the Foster Armstrong House and Nelden Roberts Stonehouse.  View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Peters Valley Self-Guided Studio Tours      Time: 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: Peters Valley Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 The Peters Valley Fine Craft Studios are open for you to visit between the hours of 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Waterfall Talk      Time: 11:00 AM to 11:15 AM,2:00 PM to 2:15 PM Location: Dingmans Falls Visitor Center (Silverthread Falls) Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join a ranger for a 15-minute talk about the geology and ecology of the park's waterfalls. WHEELCHAIR ACCESSIBLE View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Peters Valley Instructor and Student Auctions      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Peters Valley Dining Hall Pavillion Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Fun and informal auction of handcrafted items made by visiting instructors, Peters Valley staff, students and friends. All proceeds benefit Peters Valley. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Full Moon Hike (Moderate Hike)      Time: 9:00 PM to 11:00 PM Location: Mt. Minsi Trailhead (40.979754 -75.142189) Fees: Free     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Join a park ranger for a moderate moonlight hike to Lookout Rock along the Appalachian Trail on Mt. Minsi. The hike will be approximately 3 miles. Participants should bring water, insect repellent, and sturdy shoes. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Dingmans After Dark: Night Hike      Time: 8:30 PM to 9:30 PM Location: Dingmans Falls Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Walk along the Dingmans Creek and use multiple senses to explore the park in a new way. WHEELCHAIR ACCESSIBLE View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Peters Valley Visiting Instructor Presentations and Slideshows      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Peters Valley School of Craft Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 At the historic Bevans Church: Nationally recognized artists and workshop instructors present and discuss their work. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Bridge the Gap: Pond Paddle      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Pocono Environmental Education Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Come join us for a free paddle on our ponds!  View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Centennial Event: 100 Mile Paddle, Day 11 of 12      Time: 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Dingmans Launch, Dingmans Ferry, PA Fees: See Event Description     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Celebrate the National Park Service 100th Anniversary by paddling with a ranger! View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Evening Program      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Dingmans Campground Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join a Ranger to learn about the many geologic, natural, and cultural resources found in the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Evening Program      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Worthington State Forest Campground Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join a Ranger to learn about the many geologic, natural, and cultural resources found in the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Nature at Night      Time: 8:00 PM to 9:30 PM Location: Pocono Environmental Education Center Fees: $5     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Take a walk in the woods to listen for owls, look at stars, and enjoy the music of the night.  View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Summer Lecture Series - Park History      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Bushkill Meeting Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Independent Scholar Ben Cohen talks about the establishment of the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Edible & Medicinal Plant Walk       Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Pocono Environmental Education Center Fees: $5     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Join us on a hike focused on wild edible & medicinal plants. View Details      Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Pocono Quilt Camp       Location: Pocono Environmental Education Center Fees: $70 per day / Call for commuter rates      Friday, September 9, 2016 Join Patti Shreiner for a relaxing time at the 17th annual Quilt Camp!  Stay for a day, the weekend, the week, or for the entire time!
